author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: مقصود آنکه اگر احبّای الهی قلب و سمع را از آنچه از قبل شنیده‌اند طاهر نمایند و بتمام توجّه بمطلع امر و ما ظهر من عنده ناظر شوند عندالله احبّ بوده…
translation: Our purpose is to show that should the loved ones of God sanctify their hearts and their ears from the vain sayings that were uttered aforetime, and turn with their inmost souls to Him Who is the Dayspring of His Revelation, and to whatsoever things He hath manifested, such behavior would be regarded as highly meritorious in the sight of God.…
